name: employee-cli
description: Simple Node.js CLI for managing employees in-memory using arrays and readline

scripts.test:quick: node -e "const m=require('./lib/employees'); m.addEmployee('1','Alice'); m.addEmployee('2','Bob'); console.log('Count', m.getEmployees().length); m.removeEmployee('1'); console.log('AfterRemove', m.getEmployees().map(e=>e.id).join(','));"
